name: You Teach! Romeo and Juliet
description:
Ever wondered what it's like to be a teacher? Join HwiYoung and KaYeon as they take on this classic play. Also intended as a companion piece for students currently studying Romeo and Juliet.

Features procedurally generated text - which means game AI creates responses to your character's questions on the spot. Many details differ every time the game is played.

This game can be completed in about 30 minutes on average. Foreign language learners may take up to an hour or more.
